nodes.speaker: handler_iris
nodes.text: Camera feed at Delta Warehouse cut for exactly ninety-three seconds. We need a clean explanation before internal audit gets there.

overlays.text: Ninety-three seconds is too neat. Someone timed a blind spot, not a random outage.
If this is a probe, someone wants to test response latency before trying something larger.

choices.label: Pull maintenance logs before contacting anyone.

args.text: Maintenance log: camera loop patch deployed 03:12 by unknown badge.

choices.label: Contact Mila immediately and pressure her for a story.

nodes.speaker: mila_runner
nodes.text: You called at a bad hour. If this is about the warehouse blackout, I already told security I saw nothing.

choices.label: Mention the loop patch in the maintenance logs.
Back off and send a neutral follow-up request.

nodes.text: Mila hangs up. Ten seconds later, a courier chat pings: 'Someone is asking about camera loops. Be careful.' Heat rises.
Mila doesn't give the name, but confirms someone inside security sold timing data to an outside broker.

args.text: Timing data sale likely involved internal security desk.

nodes.text: Mila gives a badge fragment and route code. It's enough to identify a compromised supervisor and stage a quiet interception.

args.text: Badge fragment: S-17 / route code NORTH-RAIL-4.

nodes.speaker: system
nodes.text: Internal audit convoy arrives in 18 minutes. Choose response posture.

choices.label: Fabricate a hardware fault report and suppress the lead.
Use the lead to run a quiet interception before audit sees the leak.
Report the breach honestly and trigger internal fallout.

endings.label: Stability Through Rot
endings.summary: Audit signs off. Leak survives. You buy quiet with future damage.

endings.label: Silent Intercept
endings.summary: Leak is contained before audit notices. Someone powerful now knows you are competent.

endings.label: Messy Win
endings.summary: You stop the transfer, but heat spikes and networks remember your methods.

endings.label: The Honest Cut
endings.summary: Truth triggers internal purge. You keep conscience, lose protection.
